snippet: Fifteen hikers from a church group who failed to return from a Sunday hike in the Southern California mountains were found safe by a helicopter search crew on Monday morning.
abstract: Fifteen hikers from a church group who failed to return from a Sunday hike in the Southern California mountains are found safe by a helicopter search crew.
lead_paragraph: Fifteen hikers from a church group who failed to return from a Sunday hike in the Southern California mountains were found safe by a helicopter search crew on Monday morning.
